title: Norway’s crown princess had years of contact with Epstein, files suggest
summary_full: Mette-Marit apologises for ‘poor judgment’ as documents reportedly include scores of email exchanges with child sex offenderNorway’s crown princess has become embroiled in another scandal after newly unsealed files appeared to show her years of extensive contact with the late child sex offender Jeffrey Epstein.The latest tranche of Epstein files, released on Friday by the US justice department, appear to include nearly 1,000 mentions of the crown princess, Mette-Marit.
